bash: /media/Dylans IPO

ok
iPod directory structure must be present before synching to the iPod can be performed.
I think that you may need to install it via itunes on a windows machine before you will get the file structure.
THERE IS NO FILE STRUCTURE ON YOUR IPOD. The drive needs to be formatted. This is what gives your pod its name and structure. The pod does not konw it is Dylan's IPOD
I set up a pod for a friend a while ago, but in the set up it formats the ipods drive and gives it a file structure. Any PC will do.
let me konw how you get on! :)
with your pod
have you never used itunes to set up the drive then?
That is strange, Did you buy it second hand?
i don't know what else to say then. does winamp allow you to name your pod?

I can only go by what I saw when I installed ny friends ipod with itunes. It formatted the drive, maybe in a different way than out of the box. I can only suggest trying it with itunes and then gtkpog should work. Ask randykay what he did with his.
